issue.title: Splitwise like web app
issue.body:
## Build expense-sharing app

A web app where friends track shared expenses and settle debts.

**Features:**
- Google OAuth + email/password login  
- Create expense groups, invite members
- Add expenses (split equally among members)
- Real-time balance calculations
- Settle up functionality
- Live updates with Socket.io

**Tech Stack:**
- Next.js 14 App Router
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Lucide React icons
- SQLite with better-sqlite3
- NextAuth.js
- Socket.io

**Design:**
- Clean, minimal - not generic AI look
- Mobile-first responsive
- Use shadcn/ui components

**Pages:**
- Landing page
- Login/Signup
- Dashboard (list groups, balances)
- Group detail (expenses, members, balances)
- Create group dialog

ems.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router, configure package.json with all dependencies (NextAuth, better-sqlite3, Socket.io, shadcn/ui), set up TypeScript config, Tailwind CSS, create .gitignore, and define shared TypeScript types for users, groups, expenses, balances, and auth

workers.task: Initialize Next.js 14 project with App Router: Create package.json with all dependencies (next@14, react, react-dom, next-auth, better-sqlite3, socket.io, socket.io-client, tailwindcss, @types/better-sqlite3, @types/node, typescript, eslint, eslint-config-next), create next.config.js, tsconfig.json with strict mode and path aliases, create .gitignore for Next.js, and create .env.example for environment variables
Configure Tailwind CSS: Create tailwind.config.js with content paths for App Router, postcss.config.js, and app/globals.css with Tailwind directives and shadcn/ui CSS variables for theming

Create shared TypeScript types and utilities: Create lib/types.ts defining User, Group, Expense, ExpenseSplit, Balance, Settlement interfaces and auth session types, create lib/db.ts as database connection singleton using better-sqlite3, and create lib/utils.ts with cn() utility for shadcn/ui class merging

ems.task: Configure NextAuth.js with Google OAuth provider and email/password credentials, create auth API routes in src/app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts, build login and signup pages with forms, implement session management, and create auth middleware for protected routes

workers.task: Create authentication types, interfaces, and shared utilities. Define TypeScript types for User, Session, Account models, and create validation schemas for email/password authentication forms.
Configure NextAuth.js with Google OAuth and Credentials provider. Create the main NextAuth configuration at src/app/api/auth/[...nextauth]/route.ts with database adapter setup and session management.
Build login and signup pages with authentication forms using shadcn/ui components. Create form handling, error states, and integrate with NextAuth signIn/signUp actions.

ems.task: Design and implement SQLite database schema with better-sqlite3, create database initialization and connection utilities, build models for Users, Groups, GroupMembers, Expenses, and ExpenseSplits tables with proper indexes and foreign key constraints
Create API routes for group management (CRUD operations), member invitation system with invite codes/email links, and group member management endpoints, handle validation and error responses

Build expense API endpoints for creating, updating, and deleting expenses, implement equal-split logic among group members, create expense listing with filtering and pagination, and handle expense categorization

Implement balance calculation engine to track who owes whom, compute net balances for each user in groups, generate settlement suggestions to minimize transactions, and create balance history tracking

Create settlement API endpoints to record payments between users, update balances after settlements, generate settlement history, and implement partial settlement support with automatic balance recalculation

Set up Socket.io server with Next.js custom server, implement real-time event broadcasting for new expenses, balance updates, member changes, and settlements, create client-side Socket.io hook for React components

Build landing page with hero section and features, create responsive dashboard page showing user's groups and overall balances, implement group list component with balance summaries, and add navigation header with user menu

Create group detail page showing expense list, member list, and individual balances, build expense creation modal with amount, description, payer selection, and receipt upload, implement expense list with filtering and pagination

Implement create group dialog with name, description, and currency selection, build member invitation modal with invite link generation and email sending, create settlement flow interface showing suggested payments and confirmation, and design all components with shadcn/ui using mobile-first responsive approach

analysisSummary: Build a Splitwise-like expense sharing web app with Next.js 14, featuring Google OAuth/email auth, expense groups with member invites, expense splitting, real-time balance calculations, debt settlement, and Socket.io live updates, using SQLite + better-sqlite3, NextAuth.js, Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui with a clean mobile-first design.

errorHistory.message: Setup EM-0 merge failed: Base branch modified - needs update
